doc:
Ed Hinton (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ed_Hinton_(actor) 0 Edgar Latimer Hinton Jr. (March 26, 1919 – October 12, 1958) was an American actor known particularly for guest-starring roles on television westerns. He was the father of actor Darby Hinton (born 1957), who was only fourteen months old, when Ed Hinton perished in an airplane crash on Santa Catalina Island off the California coast. Edgar_Latimer_Hinton_Jr. ( March_26_,_1919 – October_12_,_1958 ) was an_American_actor known particularly for guest-starring roles on television_westerns . He was the_father of actor_Darby_Hinton_( born 1957_) , who was only_fourteen_months old , when Ed_Hinton perished in an_airplane_crash on Santa_Catalina_Island off the_California_coast .
